posts.title: Automobile Dog Safety Harness
posts.content: Keep your furry family member safe while on the road by placing them in the automobile dog safety harness. This specially designed harness acts as a sort of child car seat but for your pet, ensuring that your small dog will travel comfortably while strapped up for safety.

posts.title: Kid’s Fort Building Kit
posts.content: Win the parent of the year award by surprising your little whipper-snappers with this kid’s fort building kit. Each kit comes with 44 8″x8″ plastic boards and 46 connectors that your kids can use to make their dream fort into a reality.

posts.title: Reversible Sequin Pillows
posts.content: Bring some color into the room with a little style using these reversible sequin pillows. Each pillow features a dual colored all-sequin exterior that you can switch from one color to another with an effortless stroke of your hand along its surface.

posts.title: Bracelet Flask
posts.content: Keep yourself lubricated without arousing suspicion by discreetly drinking out of this bracelet flask. This must-have alcoholic accessory cleverly conceals a 2.5 ounce stainless steel flask within its stylish and unassuming bracelet shape.

posts.title: Race Car Bed
posts.content: Make your dream of owning a rubber burning muscle car a reality by plopping down on this one of a kind race car bed. The sturdy race car frame is capable of holding up to 300 pounds and comes with built-in sound effects and functioning LED headlights.

posts.title: Crawling Baby Zombie Prop
posts.content: Scare the living daylights out of your roommate by setting this crawling baby zombie prop loose in your home. This haunting little prop comes dressed in a tattered, blood-stained pale blue onesie that will haunt your dreams as he slowly makes his way towards you.

posts.title: Portable Bucket Top Misting Fan
posts.content: Stay cool while Mother Nature tries to suffocate you with her warm embrace by using this bucket top misting fan. It comes with an 18-volt lithium-ion battery, and it can be operated with either a garden hose or with a bucket filled with water.

posts.title: Cold Brew Coffee Maker
posts.content: Get your caffeine fix on a warm summer day by using this cold brew coffee maker. It’s built with stainless steel parts for maximum durability, gives your beverage a rich full-bodied flavor, and makes up to 14 servings per batch.

posts.title: Reusable Bamboo Towels
posts.content: Do your part for the environment by switching over to these reusable bamboo towels for all your clean-up needs. These heavy-duty towels are not only stronger but also more absorbent and durable than standard paper towels.

posts.title: Fire Starting Survival Carabiner Multi-Tool
posts.content: If you’re heading into the great outdoors, this fire starting survival carabiner multi-tool should be a no-brainer to pack. It features a sturdy stainless steel frame that has been outfitted with six useful and possibly life-saving tools like a small knife, a screw driver, and a fire starter.

posts.title: Sleep Yoga Posture Pillows
posts.content: Ensure you get proper neck cervical alignment while you slumber by using one of these sleep yoga posture pillows. It contours to the natural neck curve and allows you to easily switch your sleeping position from back to side position without having to adjust or fold the pillow.

posts.title: Himalayan Salt Shot Glasses
posts.content: Give your tequila shots an irresistible gourmet twist by serving them in these Himalayan salt shot glasses. Carved from high quality Himalayan pink salt, they have a pleasant salty taste and a gorgeous rose quartz appearance.
